## Executive Summary

One-paragraph summary of what happened, impact, and duration.

**Example**:
"On December 27, 2025, our PostgreSQL database experienced a connection pool exhaustion issue lasting 45 minutes, affecting API response times. 12% of users experienced timeouts when submitting assignments. We resolved the issue by restarting the connection pool and rolling back a recent query optimization that was leaking connections."
